title: Clean rebuild and redeploy after failed deployment

requirements.text: Perform a clean rebuild of the project and redeploy the canisters, ensuring all prior build artifacts/caches are cleared so the deployment runs from a fresh build state.
acceptanceCriteria: A new deployment completes successfully without the prior failure state recurring due to stale build artifacts.
The deployed app loads and reaches the normal routing flow (login/onboarding/dashboard) without crashing.

constraints: Do not introduce new product features; this request is only for a clean rebuild/redeploy.
Respect the existing single-actor Motoko backend architecture and the frontend immutable paths list.
nonGoals: Implementing any of the listed new feature requests (missed-day popup, milestones, custom domain mapping, XP tracker).
Refactoring or changing backend schemas/state unless required strictly to complete a clean rebuild.
